Detailed Description

CSettingsStorage implementation for INI files.

Member Function Documentation

void CSettingsStorageIniFile::SetIniFileName (  LPCTSTR  IniName,
LPCTSTR  SectionName
)  [inline]
 

Defines the INI Filename related to this storage object.

Call it before any calls to CSettings::Load() or CSettings::Save().

Parameters:
IniName The INI complete Pathname.
SectionName The root section name. Root items of the settings will appear under this section.
